title: Olinda festival, 1952: festival presentations (CD)
brief_description: Audio recording of the 1952 Olinda Festival (later known as the Melbourne Film Festival), attended by over 600 film enthusiasts at two venues - Olinda and Sassafras - 26/01/1952 to the 28/01/1952. Interviewees: A. F. Bottomley, Pat Hanna, Stanley Hanna. Speakers include: G. S. Browne, Wilfred Selwyn Kent Hughes, Alan Ken Stout.
